Submit application and receive approval from the the Georgia State Construction Industry Licensing Board.
Pass the Master Plumber examination.

09c157b5-c216-4931-80be-e41ef7c5a450.description: Earners of the Certified Plumber badge for the State of Florida have demonstrated the necessary qualifications, training, experience, and technical knowledge to properly plan, lay out, and install and repair plumbing apparatus and equipment including the supervision of such in accordance with the standards, rules, and regulations established by the Florida Construction Industry Licensing Board.
09c157b5-c216-4931-80be-e41ef7c5a450.name: Certified Plumber - Florida

alignments.name: 2017 Florida Building Code – Plumbing, Sixth Edition

badge_template_activities.title: Have a minimum of four years of experience or a combination of college and experience.
Pass the state certification examination.
Submit application and receive approval from the the Florida State Construction Industry Licensing Board.

e11b3675-b15e-45d4-86d9-1558eb2ed549.description: Earners of the Journeyman Plumber badge for the State of Georgia have completed their apprenticeship under a master plumber. They are fully knowledgeable in the skills needed to be a plumber, and they have a working knowledge and application of the skills required to work as a plumber.
e11b3675-b15e-45d4-86d9-1558eb2ed549.name: Journeyman Plumber - State of Georgia

badge_template_activities.title: Have at least three years of qualifying experience under a master plumber.
Submit application and receive approval from the the Georgia State Construction Industry Licensing Board.
Pass the Journeyman Plumber examination.

a4bbb512-5899-499e-9610-78a918186b2f.description: Earners of the Service Technician and Legal Compliance Competency Badge for the State of Alabama have successfully passed a board certified examination and practical evaluation as recognized by the Alabama Liquefied Petroleum Gas Board.
a4bbb512-5899-499e-9610-78a918186b2f.name: Liquefied Petroleum Gas Service Technician and Legal Compliance

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Employee Exam & Endorsement Card Application and schedule examination and/or practical evaluation.
Successfully pass board certified examination and practical evaluation.

2b60167b-151d-46a8-a612-aaa2f3079c74.description: Earners of the Commercial Plumber badge for the State of South Carolina have demonstrated the necessary qualifications, training, experience, and technical knowledge to properly plan, lay out, and install and repair plumbing apparatus and equipment including the supervision of such in accordance with the standards, rules, and regulations established by the South Carolina Contractor’s Licensing Board.
2b60167b-151d-46a8-a612-aaa2f3079c74.name: Commercial Plumber - South Carolina

badge_template_activities.title: Have 2 years of hands-on commercial plumbing experience.
Submit application and fee.
Pass commercial plumbing exam.

333528ce-21a7-435c-91cc-3fa86b9d0058.description: Earners of the Forklift Certified Trainer badge have been company certified to train employees on the safety and operational aspects of a forklift in the work environment. The learner has demonstrated knowledge in forklift operation, maintenance, capacity, stability, vehicle use and limitations, as well as demonstrated their ability to train consistent to company and OSHA standards.
333528ce-21a7-435c-91cc-3fa86b9d0058.name: Forklift Company Trainer

alignments.name: OSHA standard 1910.178 - Powered Industrial Trucks
alignments.description: This program is designed to follow the OSHA Regulations found in OSHA standard 1910.178.

badge_template_activities.title: Must meet certain performance requirements, including but not limited to being certified for at least six months, accident free operation, exhibit leadership qualities, and be recognized/nominated by the leadership team.
Complete online Forklift trainer course covering training topics meeting OSHA standard 1910.178.
Complete assessment call with Company Master Trainer verifying understanding of forklift training standards and company equipment training procedures.

0552d4ea-078a-4aa6-a19c-a551db1e0b3c.description: Earners of the Ladder Safety badge have been trained to identify ladder types, recognize the common hazards associated with ladder use, and have demonstrated knowledge of requirements and best practices for ladder safety. This certification meets OSHA/workplace requirements.
0552d4ea-078a-4aa6-a19c-a551db1e0b3c.name: Ladder Safety

alignments.name: 1910.23 – Walking-working Surfaces: Ladders
alignments.description: This program follows the OSHA Regulations found in OSHA standard 1910.23.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete in-person or online OSHA approved training on Ladder selection and safety.
Pass knowledge and use assessment on the safe selection and use of ladders.

0f61bb65-eb4f-4c6b-bb3b-bbcee8c01853.description: Earners of the Plumbing Contractor badge for the State of North Carolina have demonstrated the necessary qualifications, training, experience, and technical knowledge to install, maintain, service, or repair plumbing or heating systems such in accordance with the standards, rules, and regulations established by the North Carolina State Board of Examiners of Plumbing, Heating and Fire Sprinkler Contractors.
0f61bb65-eb4f-4c6b-bb3b-bbcee8c01853.name: Plumbing Contractor - North Carolina

badge_template_activities.title: Have 2 years (4,000 hours) of on-site, full-time experience in the installation, maintenance, service or repair of plumbing or heating systems related to the category for which you wish to be licensed.
Submit application and fee.
Pass Plumbing, Heating Group exam.

0de702b4-a6c1-4cfe-a697-54df01f7cb3a.description: Earners of the Residential Plumber badge for the State of South Carolina have demonstrated the necessary qualifications, training, experience, and technical knowledge to properly plan, lay out, and install and repair plumbing apparatus and equipment including the supervision of such in accordance with the standards, rules, and regulations established by the South Carolina Contractor’s Licensing Board.
0de702b4-a6c1-4cfe-a697-54df01f7cb3a.name: Residential Plumber - South Carolina

badge_template_activities.title: Have 1 year of hands-on residential plumbing experience.

alignments.description: This program is designed to follow the OSHA Regulations found in OSHA standard 1910.178.

badge_template_activities.title: Must meet certain performance requirements, including but not limited to being certified for at least six months, accident free operation, exhibit leadership qualities, and be recognized/nominated by the leadership team.
